directorBiography: Macro Steel is a second year student at Tufts University in the Film and Media Studies program. He is an emerging filmmaker and local to the Boston area who works primarily in horror.

title: Larryâ€™s Spot
directorBiography:
Macro Steel is a second year student at Tufts University in the Film and Media Studies program. He is an emerging filmmaker and local to the Boston area who works primarily in horror.

Will Caron is a second year student at Ithica College. He majors in Writing for Film, TV, and Emerging Media, and specializes in horror and comedy.
directorStatement: The film is particularly personal to me and something that I see more as a crime of passion than a well thought out piece. The Film is a bit of a look into how lost one can get after their partner leaves them abruptly and how scary that can be.
overview: An experimental short horror film about losing a lover.Change

title: Mr. Steel
directorBiography: Macro Steel is a second year student at Tufts University in the Film and Media Studies program. He is an emerging filmmaker and local to the Boston area who works primarily in horror. Will Caron is a second year student at Ithica College. He majors in Writing for Film, TV, and Emerging Media, and specializes in horror and comedy.
directorStatement: The film is particularly personal to me and something that I see more as a crime of passion than a well thought out piece. The Film is a bit of a look into how lost one can get after their partner leaves them abruptly and how scary that can be.
overview: An experimental short horror film about losing a lover.
